name: [PROTO] Grappin
description:
/!\ THERE IS NO TUTORIAL NOR SUFFICIENT GAMEPLAY FEEDBACK /!\

Please, do not play this prototype if you're looking for a pleasant experience.

Controls:

  • WASD+Space-> move/jump
    • Without touching anything, the character goes straight ahead. You can strafe with A/D and change direction by pressing W.
    • On the ground, you jump in the direction of your arm.
  • Shift/Ctrl -> Dive to the ground/slide
  •  Click on blue columns -> Grab it. Click again to release.
  • - R -> Respawn to the last checkpoint
